content:
{"name": "Developing K.I.D.S.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Every Tuesday the community is welcome to:
	* Enter the McNichols parking lot any time after 8:30am on Tuesdays
	* Distribution is on lighthouse side door.
	* Numbers will be passed out at 8:45am
	* Shoppers are asked to immediately return to vehicles and remain on the lot until 9:45a.
	* 9:45am Line up in number order
	* Developing K.I.D.S. team will open doors for shopping at 10:00am.
	* Shopping Bags will be distributed by our team.
	* Outside bags are not permitted.
	* Our team, volunteers, and shoppers exercise kindness, respect, patience, and community sharing here at Developing K.I.D.S. food distribution. 
", "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/developingkids", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "24230 West McNichols Road", "address_2": null, "city": "The Eye", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48219", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4147819, "longitude": -83.2789621}, "phones": [{"number": "(888) 294-6554", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open to all"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
